title: "Pick a Goal and Aim at It!"  Kansas City Engineer Moves to Silicon Valley and Makes a Schedule
description:
Dave is a data analyst living in Santa Cruz working in high tech in the Bay Area.

Both parents are from India, arranged marriage, both educated as physicians, came to the United States to do their residency, now both are psychiatrists, plus mother is a speaker and travels around the country giving lectures.

Grew up in Kansas City, always interested in the performing arts but got a degree in Physics at college.
Research position in astrophysics in grad school on a NASA grant.
Got into programming.
Became a data analyst for a startup in Kansas.
Moved to Bay Area in 2018
Data Analysis, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning
Data scientists make predictions out of large data sets
Data analysts test things and make sure they work they are supposed to work
College roommate was a philosophy major so he enjoyed sparring.
Started listening to Jordan B Peterson to get some good arguments for the discussions.
As a clinical psychologist, his advice is always from a “What can you do about it?” perspective.
First thing he put into practice:  “Make a schedule, one that you would like.”
He used it to lose weight, go to the gym and then spend a couple of hours a day drawing and painting.
Then he started refining the schedule, and added in getting a protein heavy breakfast.
Think of yourself as a node. That makes your every smile or helping hand change something important in the world, and you start seeing positive feedback loops.
“Pick an ideal and aim at it” You need to chase after something, and need something chasing you.
Loves the Bay Area and Santa Cruz and the ocean. Probably not going back to Kansas.
Enjoying the Jordan Peterson meetup.
